channel.title: Help me as much as you can please,
channel.description: Okay i have an deltascape source how do i add the ::Yell command? also im new to havin a server i click on client than wat? please help me. :[

item.title: Help me as much as you can please,
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In the ‘customCommand’ method, add:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if (muted == 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "";
            }
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner] ";
            }
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5);
        } else {
            sendMessage("That is blocked from the yell command.");
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help me as much as you can please,
